name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flexer - Feedback Submitter for FAST NUCES

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-Click Submission of FLEX Feedback for FAST-NUCES ( National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences )

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables students of FAST-NUCES to submit FLEX Course Feedback with a single click.

Usage:
1 ) Install this extension
2 ) Go to Flex Course Feedback page
3 ) Click Yes on the prompt that you receive.
4 ) Extension will guide you automatically.

Note! You should use this extension only when you don't have time to submit feedback or you don't wanna waste your time on it. You should manually submit feedback if you want to leave comments/remarks for courses.
